article.description: Keith Bogans and Co. rolled past the Utes to claim the final spot in the Sweet 16.
article.headline: Kentucky's 25th straight win comes against familiar foe
article.linkText: Kentucky rings up 25th straight, routing Utes
article.story: SALT LAKE CITY (AP) -- Andrew Bogut had 25 points and 12 rebounds in his second college appearance, a 75-74 overtime loss to the Australian club team Sydney Comets on Thursday. Bogut, a 6-foot-10, 230-pound freshman from Australia, was 9-for-10 from the field and 7-for-8 from the free throw line. Bogut had 21 points and 14 rebounds in Utah's first exhibition game. Nick Jacobson added 20 points for the Utes, who open the season Monday against Georgia State in the preseason NIT. The Utes had just two field goals in overtime as they were outscored by the Comets 11-10. Patrick Mutumbo led Sydney with 22 points.
